# identifier

**Instance Property**

The value your app uses to identify the media item.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String? { get }
```

## Describing the Media Item

- **artwork**: Artwork for the media item.
- **title**: The media item title.
- **artist**: The artist associated with the media item.
- **type**: The media item type.
- **INMediaItemType**: The type of content the media item describes.

items.description: The artist associated with the media item.
items.name: artist

items.description: The type of content the media item describes.
